select id,createDate,updateDate,createUser,updateUser,username,name,password from sys_user su where 1 = 1
and (name like concat('%',#{dto.name} ,'%') or username like concat('%',#{dto.name} ,'%'))
and date (createDate) = date (#{dto.createDate} )
and date (createDate) >= date (#{dto.createDateStart} )
and date (createDate) <= date (#{dto.createDateEnd} )
and date (updateDate) = date (#{dto.updateDate} )
and date (updateDate) >= date (#{dto.updateDateStart} )
and date (updateDate) <= date (#{dto.updateDateEnd} )
and createUser in (select id from sys_user s where name like concat('%',#{dto.name} ,'%') or username like concat('%',#{dto.name} ,'%'))
and s.updateUser in (select id from sys_user u where name like concat('%',#{dto.name} ,'%') or username like concat('%',#{dto.name} ,'%'))
order by createDate desc
